price: 18. Mpe kobalolaka elongi te na lofundo liboso ya bato mpe kotambola te na mokili osepela nayo moko koleka, mpamba te Allah alingaka bato ya lolendo na lofundo te. (komitombola na lolendo liboso ya bato te)
arabic: وَلَا تُصَعِّرۡ خَدَّكَ لِلنَّاسِ وَلَا تَمۡشِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَرَحًاۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَالٖ فَخُورٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
